# collect(queue:completion:)

**Instance Method**

Stops an outstanding data transfer report and delivers the result.

## Declaration

```swift
@preconcurrency func collect(queue: DispatchQueue, completion: @escaping (NWConnection.DataTransferReport) -> Void)
```
title: collect(queue:completion:)
